Design a tissue box that doubles as a humidifier by adding a small water tank inside the box and using it to release steam when tissues are used.
Create a tissue box that has a built-in sanitizer that kills germs on the tissues.
Design a tissue box that is made from biodegradable materials and is compostable after use.
Develop a tissue box that has a built-in air purifier to filter out allergens and pollutants in the air.
Create a tissue box that comes with a set of reusable filters that can be replaced instead of buying new tissues.
